text: 19|5|haey pitabrakd nasa   khnhom baromph khlach nheatesandean robsakhnhom banteab  pi khnhom( min ach pongrung sasanea robsa trong ban)  haey phriyea robsakhnhom  chea sdrei del min ach meankaun .  dau che  neah haey saum trong me tda bratan  anak snang trakaul mneak pi trong dl khnhom phng .
